title: Padres tickets go on sale Feb. 11 at FanFest
subtitle: Padres tickets go on sale Feb. 11 at FanFest
body: SAN DIEGO -- The Padres have announced that single-game tickets for the 2012 season will go on sale during FanFest, presented by Bloomberg Sports, on Feb. 11 at Petco Park.  The day-long event is free and open to the public. Gates open to the general public at 10 a.m. PT. Season-ticket holders receive early access from 8:30-9:30 a.m. Those eligible will receive printable early entry passes through e-mail.  Fans who are not season-ticket holders can register for free for special passes that will allow them to enter the stadium at 9:30 a.m. Corey Brock is a reporter for MLB.com. Keep track of @FollowThePadres on Twitter. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Corey Brock
